metadata.title: Yoga Stenungsund - Your local yoga studio
metadata.description: Welcome to Yoga Stenungsund. We offer yoga classes for all levels in the heart of Stenungsund. Find balance, strength and calm with us.

hero.title: Welcome to Yoga Stenungsund
hero.subtitle: Your place for calm, strength and balance

footer.copyright: Â© 2024 Yoga Stenungsund. All rights reserved.

hero.title: Welcome to Yoga Stenungsund
hero.subtitle: Your local yoga studio in the heart of Stenungsund
hero.description: Discover the power of yoga with our experienced teachers. We offer classes for all levels in a warm and welcoming environment.
hero.tagline: Everyone can find peace at sea, can you find it in your everyday life?

intro.title: Why choose Yoga Stenungsund?
intro.description: We believe in yoga as a path to physical strength, mental clarity and inner peace. Our goal is to make yoga accessible to everyone.

experienced.title: Experienced teachers
experienced.description: Our certified instructors guide you safely through your yoga journey

allLevels.title: All levels welcome
allLevels.description: From beginners to advanced practitioners - we have classes for you

community.title: Community
community.description: Become part of our warm and supportive yoga community

flexible.title: Flexible schedule
flexible.description: Morning, lunch and evening classes that fit your lifestyle

cta.title: Ready to start your yoga journey?
cta.description: Take the first step towards a more balanced life. Try your first class with us!

classes.metaDescription: Explore our range of yoga classes. From dynamic Vinyasa to relaxing Yin - find the perfect class for you.
classes.title: Our yoga classes
classes.description: We offer a wide range of yoga classes for all levels and needs. Find the perfect class for you!

cta.title: Ready to start?
cta.description: Find the perfect class for you in our schedule.

happenings.title: Happenings
happenings.description: Discover our special events, retreats and workshops. Deepen your yoga practice and create new memories with our community.

booking.title: Interested?
booking.description: Sign up or contact us for more information.

cta.title: Want to join?
cta.description: All our happenings are open to both members and drop-in participants. Contact us for more information and registration.
